Home Security How to prevent sneak shots when you live
If you are secretly photographed, call the police on time and ask the people around you for help.
Rented houses, hotels, and even some upscale hotels.
1.When using a rental property, check everywhere for electrical outlet holes, bathroom mirrors (especially in combination with one-way glass), smoke detectors, light sockets... The most effective way to visually cut off the possibility of candid shots. Taking safety pants as an example, if you wear safety pants when wearing a skirt, it can more effectively protect personal privacy...。 1.Stay away from any unidentified objects moving down your skirt, whether it is a cane, or a shoe, or a remote-controlled toy. At present, many pinhole cameras have been made very small, and some professional candid shots can often produce some incredible equipment. 2.Stay away from people tying your shoes next to you. 2.When using the furniture attached to the rental house, check the air-conditioning hole, the telephone may be monitored) and the top of the wardrobe. 3.Stay away from crutches near you, or black plastic bags, bags, etc. that are lower than a girl skirt 3.When staying in hotels, guesthouses, and guest houses, there are many places where pinhole cameras can be installed due to the hotel’s complete equipment, including air conditioners, lampshades, ceilings, vanity mirrors, smoke sensors, vases, sockets, and TV stands. Pay special attention to Equipment and furnishings facing the bed. 4.In shopping malls, locker rooms, public toilets and other places, you must first check whether there are mobile phones and cameras left behind. 1.Bus and subway 2.Stairs Or Elevator 3.Overpass 4.Fitting room and bathroom If you are sitting on a seat, it is best to put your hands or books, bags and other items on your lap and keep your legs together, while your legs are upright; if you are standing, it is best to choose an area where women are concentrated, and be vigilant. When going up the stairs, try to walk on the side of the wall and tighten your shorts with one hand, and be careful not to walk too much; when taking the elevator, it is best to stand sideways or fold your legs. Standing sideways often makes those sneakers unable to recover. Be aware of suspicious people under or behind the stairs. When crossing an overpass, it is generally easy to be photographed walking on both sides, but walking in the middle can greatly reduce the risk. When changing clothes and going to the toilet, pay attention to whether there are sneak-camera devices around, pay special attention to the space above the head and under the feet, and pay special attention to the trash can when using public toilets; secondly, you should also pay attention to whether there are suspicious objects in or below the toilet, as perverts may Wireless pinholes are hidden inside for candid shots; in hot spring swimming pools, whether there are suspicious items in the dressing room, and at the same time, pay attention to candid shots of the same sex, and be alert to whether someone is approaching with a basket or bag during summer entertainment. When using a rental property, check everywhere for electrical outlet holes, bathroom mirrors (especially in combination with one-way glass), smoke detectors, light sockets...。 Hotels, guesthouses, and homestays are all equipped with fixed-position candid camera equipment. Usually by means of a wired line for continuous power supply and signal transmission...。 There are many other places, such as tissue boxes, sound, hooks, clocks and so on, where these cameras are invisible.
